mapper.select: SELECT s.id as id, s.title AS title, h.name AS holeName, sd.show_date AS startDate ,sd.show_time AS start_time, img_route AS imgRoute FROM rent_place_reservation_tb AS r JOIN hole_tb AS h ON h.id= r.hole_id JOIN show_tb AS s ON s.id = r.show_id JOIN show_datetime_tb AS sd ON sd.hole_id=h.id WHERE s.organizer_id=#{id} AND s.show_status=1 AND r.rent_place_status=1
